Tim Budworth
Director of College Technology at South Mountain Community College
March 29, 2011, Michelle worked with Tim in different groups

Tim Budworth was the Director of IT and Facilities at Collins College while I was an instructor there, and he is one of the most professional, capable, multi-talented, and friendly people I have ever worked with. He kept our IT infrastructure humming along even with constantly changing requirements from various departments, and he was always available to offer help or answer questions. He also made sure that classrooms and offices always had what we needed, and for a school with such a diverse offering of courses, that was not an easy task. He even oversaw the buildout of a new classroom/studio facility and a new main campus and did a fantastic job. I highly recommend Tim Budworth.

Frank Pöhlmann
Managing Editor, Acquisitions, at Packt Publishing
March 14, 2011, Michelle reported directly to Frank

Frank Pohlmann is an extremely knowledgeable editor and an excellent mentor. He knows every corner of the editing and publishing process, and he excels at communicating with people at every level of that process. He’s always current on industry trends, and I always learn something new when I talk to him. Frank has been one of the best supervisors I have ever had, always brilliant and entertaining, and he has been a tremendous help to me in making the transition from teaching to publishing.
